import React,{useState} from 'react' const UpdateStudents = (props) => { const functionality = props.functionality console.log(functionality) const [adding, setAdding] = useState(false) const [editing, setEditing] = useState(false) //student props const [new_name, setName] = useState('') const [new_school, setSchool] = useState('') const [new_description, setDescription] = useState('') const [new_salary, setSalary] = useState('') const [new_single_lesson_time, setSingle_lesson_time] = useState('') const [new_lessons_time, setLessons_time] = useState('') const [new_unpaid_time, setUnpaid_time] = useState('') const [new_holydays, setHolydays] = useState(false) const addProduct = async() => { const new_student = { name: new_name, school: new_school, body: new_description, salary: new_salary, single_lesson_time: new_single_lesson_time, lessons_times : new_lessons_time, unpaid_time : new_unpaid_time, holydays : new_holydays } const request = await fetch('/students/add/',{ method: "POST", headers: { 'Content-Type':'application/json' }, body:JSON.stringify(new_student) }) setAdding(false) window.location = "/students" } return (
{!adding&&functionality === "add" && } {!editing&&functionality === "edit" && } {(adding || editing )&&
{adding? "Add": "Edit"}
{setName(e.target.value)}}> {setSchool(e.target.value)}}> {setSalary(e.target.value)}}> {setLessons_time(e.target.value)}}> {setSingle_lesson_time(e.target.value)}}> {setUnpaid_time(e.target.value)}}>

{setHolydays((prev)=> {return !prev})}}>
{adding&&<> } {editing&&<> }
}
) } export default UpdateStudents
